com.navis.framework.presentation

Class TreeUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.navis.framework.presentation.TreeUtils

  • public class TreeUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains utility methods for manipulating trees
    Author:
    Arvinder Brar, 2011-02-18

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static ITreeNode createRootNode(ITreeObject inRootTreeObject)
      Creates a root ITreeNode for the root ITreeObject
      static ITreeWidget createTreeWidget(ITreeNode inRootNode)
      Creates a tree widget from a tree node.
      static ITreeWidget createTreeWidget(ITreeNode inRootNode, java.lang.Object inDefaultSelection)
      Creates a tree widget from a tree node and selects the node whose value is equal to the defaultSelection value.
      static ITreeWidget createTreeWidget(ITreeObject inRootTreeObject)
      Creates a tree widget from an object which implements ITreeObject.
      static ITreeWidget createTreeWidget(ITreeObject inRootTreeObject, java.lang.Object inDefaultSelection)
      /** Creates a tree widget from an object which implements ITreeObject and selects the node whose value is equal to the defaultSelection value Use this method if you are NOT overriding the base tree node factory which is defined as a bean in the presentation application context, otherwise use the createTreeWidget(ITreeNode inRootNode, Object inDefaultSelection) method

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • createTreeWidget

        @Nullable
public static ITreeWidget createTreeWidget(ITreeObject inRootTreeObject)
        Creates a tree widget from an object which implements ITreeObject. Use this method if you are NOT overriding the base tree node factory which is defined as a bean in the presentation application context, otherwise use the createTreeWidget(ITreeNode inRootNode) method
        Parameters:
        inRootNode -
        Returns:
        ITreeWidget

                                                      java.lang.Object inDefaultSelection)
        /** Creates a tree widget from an object which implements ITreeObject and selects the node whose value is equal to the defaultSelection value Use this method if you are NOT overriding the base tree node factory which is defined as a bean in the presentation application context, otherwise use the createTreeWidget(ITreeNode inRootNode, Object inDefaultSelection) method
        Parameters:
        inRootNode -
        inDefaultSelection - - in most cases it will be an ITreeObject instance
        Returns:

public static ITreeWidget createTreeWidget(@NotNull

      • createTreeWidget

        @Nullable
public static ITreeWidget createTreeWidget(@NotNull
                                                      ITreeNode inRootNode,
                                                      java.lang.Object inDefaultSelection)
        Creates a tree widget from a tree node and selects the node whose value is equal to the defaultSelection value. Use this method if you are overriding the tree node factory which is defined as a bean in the presentation application context, otherwise use the createTreeWidget(ITreeObject inRootTreeObject, Object inDefaultSelection) method
        Parameters:
        inRootNode -
        inDefaultSelection - - in most cases it will be an ITreeObject instance
        Returns:
        ITreeWidget
